experience.openToOpportunities: I'm open to new opportunities and projects. Get in touch!

position1.title: Software Engineer
position1.description: Working on research projects in underwater robotics. Modernization of hyperbaric chambers. Creating pneumatic low and high pressure panels.
position1.achievement1: Work on underwater vehicle for collecting physicochemical samples helping locate corpses 'UTOPIEC'
position1.achievement2: Building diving vision system for two divers
position1.achievement3: Work on research project of 5-axis underwater manipulator
position1.achievement4: Modernization of military FALCON type ROV vehicles
position1.achievement5: Building pressure chamber for testing electrical equipment tightness
position1.technologies: ROS2, Python, C++, OpenCV, SolidWorks, Inventor, Electronics, Robotics

position2.achievement3: Coordination of orders and construction processes
